channel.title: Is Direct2Dirive better or as good as steam
channel.description: I was thinking about buying a couple games off it I need some reviews

item.title: Is Direct2Dirive better or as good as steam
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
I find D2D just about as good. I’ll get something from there if it’s cheaper, and it does mean I don’t have to have Steam running. Plus, I can usually still get it to run with Steam anyway (unless the game is stupid, like GTA4)
Another store I’ve used for two games so far is Impulse
https://www.impulsedriven.com

Read full topic

item.title: Is Direct2Dirive better or as good as steam
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
I’ve never used D2D, but Steam has an integrated community and update support, and as such is infinitely better.

Plus Valve makes it.
